unit: Unit 9 | Inference for Quantitative Data: Slopes
title: Prove That Slope
question_text: Scientists always believed that two given variables were associated and had an average slope of $-1.5$ .  A new young scientist believed that, in fact, this slope was actually less than this and set out to prove it using a $t$ -test for slope.  What would the hypotheses for this test be?

choices.text: H 0 : b = 0 H 0 : b = 0 H a : b < 0 H a : b < 0
